title: The Highway
description: Driven out of their home after the marauders took so much from the group, the survivors leave California to find safety in Idaho with the rest of Trentâ€™s family. With only a last known address to shoot for, the survivors set off on a journey along highway 15.In a zombie ravaged world where everything has changed, the group has only one hope, that they will not lose themselves in the race to find their next safe area. Highway 15 is their best chance to get to that illusive safety net, but that safety will not come without a cost.How much would you be willing to pay for a chance to begin again?
author: J.  Rudolph
